verbs.description: ruth jesus and the migrant invasionruth jesus and the migrant invasion the bible [V: has] been described as the ultimate immigration story the biblical story describes people constantly on the move following god guidance into new and unknown lands jacob and his family are part of a wave of immigrants emigrating into egypt to escape starvation their descendants the hebraic peoples ezra egypt jesus boaz obed twenty fifth dynasty of egypt bethlehem naomi holy family jesse usa matthew women of agency providence elimelek joseph ruth community leader orpah israel howard thurman king david jacob moabite providence rhode island professor nehemiah nobel prize abraham bruce epperly
